nodes.text: This traditional Mandalorian battle armor was the personal battle suit of the ruling Mandalorian known as the Mandalore. It was said that this armor was in exceptional condition despite the numerous battles it had seen and that Mandalore never voluntarily took it off, even while sleeping. Mandalore's armor was said to have been worn by Mandalore the Preserver, who traveled with Meetra Surik during the First Jedi Purge.
